snippet.title: Derelict Void Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Derelict Void will launch to steam on March 18th 2021

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479340/
Website: https://derelictvoid.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stirling_games​
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/pwWQSVF

Derelict Void is a galactic roguelike city-builder involving scavenging for resources and base management. You command a ship and crew searching for resources you need to stay alive.
